フェレット捕獲中かまれた警官、感染症治療続け１７年後死亡…公務災害認定

07 Nov 2019, 12:48

　２００２年にイタチ科の哺乳類フェレットの捕獲作業中に手をかまれ、感染症の治療を続けていた大分県警地域課の男性警部補（４１）が今年１月に亡くなり、労災に当たる公務災害の認定を受けていたことがわかった。
　県警によると、警部補は大分市内の交番に勤務していた０２年６月、市民から通報を受けて公園でフェレットを捕獲しようとした際にかまれた。同年９月、細菌に感染して炎症が広がる「蜂窩織炎（ほうかしきえん）」と診断された。休職と復職を繰り返し、今年１月に同県内の病院で死亡した。県警は死因を明らかにしていない。
　遺族から公務災害の申請を受けた地方公務員災害補償基金大分県支部は、かまれたことと死亡との因果関係を認め、７月２６日付で認定した。
　フェレットは体長約４０センチ。獣医師で、おおいた動物愛護センターの佐伯久所長（６１）は「フェレットにはとがった歯があり、野生化した個体にかまれると、皮膚の奥まで細菌が入り込むこともある」と話している。

Police officer bitten during ferret capture, infectious disease treatment continued, died 17 years later ...

07 Nov 2019, 12:48

In 2002, the Oita Prefectural Police Department's Male Police Department (41), who was bitten during the capture of a weasel mammal ferret and continued to treat infectious diseases, died in January this year, and was certified as a public accident that caused industrial accidents. I understood that I was receiving.
According to the prefectural police, the assistant policeman was bitten in June 2002 when he was working for a police box in Oita City and received a report from a citizen and tried to capture a ferret in the park. In September of the same year, the patient was diagnosed with “Horticitis” which spreads with inflammation caused by bacteria. After taking leave and returning to work, he died at a hospital in the same prefecture in January this year. The prefectural police have not revealed the cause of death.
The local civil servant disaster compensation fund Oita Prefecture, which received an application for civil service accidents from the bereaved family, recognized the causal relationship between biting and death and certified it on July 26.
Ferret is about 40 cm long. “The ferret has sharp teeth, and if it is bitten by a wild individual, bacteria may enter the back of the skin,” said a veterinarian, director of the Oita Animal Welfare Center (61). .
